{{cpp/ranges/take_while_view/title|pred}}
{{cpp/ranges/take_while_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr const Pred&amp; pred() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a reference to the stored predicate {{rlpi|/#Data members|pred_}}.

If {{c|*this}} does not store a predicate (e.g. an exception is thrown on the assignment to {{c|*this}}, which copy-constructs or move-constructs a {{tt|Pred}}), the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A reference to the stored predicate.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    static constexpr int a[]{1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
    constexpr auto v = a {{!}} std::views::take_while([](int x){ return x &lt; 4; });
    const auto pred = v.pred();
    static_assert(pred(3));
}
}}
